name: Physics Spinner
description:
You are a being of great Importance and power.... You are a Galactic Cradle! One of many beings who are responsible for the creation of new Galaxies by condensing enough mass to spawn a "Black Hole". 

At birth, every being of your race is bonded to one single heavenly body. Through this bond you have the ability to manipulate that heavenly body's gravity by spending some of your cosmic power. 

However this bond is very fragile, if you or the heavenly body your bonded with collides against objects with larger masses or worse is attacked by "Voidlings", then the bond is broken and you both are lost to the void. Forever....
